name: iPhone 14 Pro Max 256 Gb 5GmmWave
description: The iPhone 14 Pro Max is the most powerful iPhone ever. It features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, the A16 Bionic chip, ProMotion technology, and a triple-camera system with Night mode. It also supports 5G mmWave for ultra-fast wireless speeds. With up to 256GB of storage, you can store all your photos, videos, and apps with ease. The iPhone 14 Pro Max is available in four stunning finishes: Graphite, Gold, Silver, and Sierra Blue. Get yours today and experience the future of iPhone.
